alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:05PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont County through 745 PM MDT... At 705 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crowheart, or 25 miles west of Pavillion, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Diversion Dam Rest Area and Bull Lake around 725 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
